trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Downingtown
There were no other sightings in Downingtown on or around April 9th 2008
Summary: Short Bursts of a white then a red lights, then motionless like a star.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am have been a pilot flying aircraft for 15 years so I know what aircraft look like at night. I took my dog out to the bathroom at 1230am est. I had looked into the sky and noticed a star like object. I looked again it had two intermittent white light that would go on and off around 2 min intervals, and also a red light that would sometimes flash, I do know that aircaft have a red anit-collision light but this was not a anit-collision light also there were no nav lights on the aircraft which aircrat have a red, and green one. Then the object would move into circles then and then zig-zag then stop. All the lights would stop flashing and it would look like a star. Then the whole sequence would start over and over agian. Very odd to me this was not an aircraft. I got cold chills through out my body. I tried to take video of it but my cam coders battery was dead. As for my camera I did take pictures but them came out black with no detail, as it is not a great camera.
